HelloWorld4

Description

HelloWorld4

Purpose

Adds an event to the constructor.

Notes

Find the greeting in the emitted event.

Author

Stephen Newell

STATE VARIABLES

greeting

the greeting to display

METHODS

constructor()

Purpose

Create a new HelloWorld4 contract on the blockchain.

Notes

Emits HelloWord4().

Parameters:

_initGreeting

set as the greeting string

EVENTS

HelloWorld4Constructed(uint256,address,string,address)

Purpose

Emitted when contract is constructed

Parameters:

HelloWorld4

address of the newly deployed contract

initGreeting

constructor arg with a greeting

sender

address sending the constructor

timestamp

block time when constructed
